import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import InputText from '../../components/inputText' import api from '../../util/api' export default function EditThreadModal({forumId, thread, setThread, open, setOpen}) { const [title, setTitle] = useState(thread.title) const [error, setError] = useState(null); const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault() if (title !== '') { editThread() setOpen(false) alert("Successfully edited thread.") } } function editThread() { thread.title = title api.editThread(forumId, thread) .then((response) => { setThread(response.data) }) .catch(error => setError(error)) } return (
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} {/* ​ */}
Edit thread
setTitle(e.target.value)} />
) }
